text: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلۡغَرۡبِيِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ

translation.en: And you, [O Muhammad], were not on the western side [of the mount] when We revealed to Moses the command, and you were not among the witnesses [to that]
translation.id: Dan engkau (Muhammad) tidak berada di sebelah barat (lembah suci Ṭuwa) ketika Kami menyampaikan perintah kepada Musa, dan engkau tidak (pula) termasuk orang-orang yang menyaksikan (kejadian itu)
